Overview

This UI toolkit is a highly-modular design system for rapid web page development. It contains different materials that can be assembled into more complex page layouts.

This guide contains real working examples, code snippets, documentation, and style guidelines.

Usage

Start by adding the following files to your page:

<link rel="stylesheet" href="assets/toolkit/styles/toolkit.css">
<script src="assets/toolkit/scripts/toolkit.js"></script>

Colors

Primary

Red
#D6252C rgba(214, 37, 44, 1.0)
Black
#212121 rgba(33, 33, 33, 1.0)
White
#FAFAFA rgba(250, 250, 250, 1.0)

Secondary

Blue
#17BECF rgba(23, 190, 207, 1.0)
Lightgrey
#F0F0F0 rgba(240, 240, 240, 1.0)
Grey
#D6D6D6 rgba(214, 214, 214, 1.0)
Midgrey
#999999 rgba(153, 153, 153, 1.0)
Hardgrey
#666666 rgba(102, 102, 102, 1.0)
Darkgrey
#303030 rgba(48, 48, 48, 1.0)

Typography

Type is Din Next and is being served from fonts.com. There are four fonts in use:

DIN Next™ W01 Regular
DIN Next™ W01 Italic
DIN Next™ W01 Medium
DIN Next™ W01 Bold
DIN Next™ W01 Condensed Bold
